|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "WRTA-108GD_V02" and "109-102-3401" is silkscreened on the board pictured below. ==Links of Interest== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/doku.php?id=oldwiki:openwrtdocs:hardware:dell:truemobile2350 On the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=22291 On the '''DD-WRT''' forums] (pics and specs) ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== 
JP1
(   ) (TxD) (   ) (   ) (RxD)

===Credentials=== They're the default '''Atheros''' AP credentials. 
Username: Admin
Password: 5up

[[Has images::internal| ]][[Has images::label| ]][[Has images::power adapter| ]] ==Notes== ===Probable included PSU(s)=== The '''pTrans''' WD411200500 was included with at least some of these devices. :FCC docs indicate that the '''Delta Electronics''' ADP-10SB Rev. B :may have bee included with other units (maybe). {{hasPowerSupply |brand = pTrans |model = WD411200500 |revision = (110-100-0095) |countrymanuf = China |input_v=120 |input_a=0.1 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=12 |output_a=0.5 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |output_OD=5 |output_ID=2.3 |output_LEN=9.5 |style=large, vertical }} [[Category:English Documentation]]
